section.heading: Promulgation of rules and regulations.
section.text: The Mayor shall promulgate rules and regulations setting forth the criteria and procedures necessary to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of Mayor’s Rulemaking Authority for the Retail Incentive Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2004 and Any Similar Succeeding Legislation, see Mayor’s Order 2004-146, August 26, 2004 ( 51 DCR 9194).
